III.i.2.F.3.a
.
Purpose of Tracked Items
The purpose of tracked items is to control receipt or non-receipt of information/evidence requested from the claimant, beneficiary, or other information/evidence provider.Â  The status of individual tracked items will be visible through VA claims-submission service websites.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F - Record Maintenance During the Development Process
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F
